ygData.subject: Re: resistance after patch
ygData.msgSnippet: I had a lot of trouble too.  Blue things were resisting and EVERYTHING seemed to be coming after me.  In a group of 5 players I was the sole target of
ygData.messageBody:
I had a lot of trouble too. Blue things were resisting and EVERYTHING
seemed to be coming after me. In a group of 5 players I was the sole
target of interest. Two big ugly deaths after the patch.

--- Tim Borelli <timb@...> wrote:
> From: Tim Borelli <timb@...>
>
> did anyone else notice a lot of resisted spells
> after the patch while
> playing last night? i certainly did... green aviaks
> were resisting ALL of
> my spells, so i left ther and went to permafrost,
> and i got a bunch of
> resists (at the wrong time, when else =)) there as
> well.
>
> just wondering if i was just having bad luck last
> night...
>
> Qorona Mindbender of the Volition Guild, 25th lvl
> enchanter on Cazic-Thule
